Palette Generator

Create Harmonious Color Palettes from a Base Color

Instantly generate harmonious color palettes from a base color. Useful for UI design, branding, and CSS themes. Fast, free, and privacy-friendly.

How to Use the Color Palette Generator

Follow these steps to generate a color palette:

  • Enter a base color (HEX format) or click Random to generate one.
  • The tool will display a palette with tints, shades, and complementary colors.
  • Click any color block to copy the value to clipboard.
  • Use Export to download the palette as CSS variables or JSON.

You May Also Need

  • Word Counter

  • Text Lowercase Converter

  • Text Uppercase Converter

  • Text Title Case Converter

  • Text Reverse Converter

  • Text Remove Line Breaks Tool

Why Use a Color Palette Generator?

Creating color palettes manually is time-consuming and subjective. This tool helps you quickly explore variations and combinations for UI, branding, or theme design with instant preview and export options.

Key Features

  • Generates tints, shades, and complementary colors.
  • Accepts HEX color input or randomize option.
  • One-click copy and export to CSS or JSON.
  • Privacy-first: runs entirely in your browser.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

What color formats does the tool support?

Currently, it accepts HEX input (e.g., #3498db). Output can be copied in HEX, RGB or CSS variable format.

Can I export the palette?

Yes. You can copy individual colors or export the whole palette as a downloadable file in multiple formats.

Is this tool free?

Yes. 100% free and works completely in your browser.

Does it require an internet connection?

Only for loading the page. All processing is client-side with no data sent to any server.
